title: Oort Cloud
alt: ...I wanna try. Hang on, be right back.
transcript:
[Three asteroids float in space.]
ISON: Have you noticed that bright dot in the distance?
Asteroid: Yeah. What's the deal with it?ISON: Dunno. I'm gonna go check it out.[Pause while ISON checks it out off screen.]ISON (broken up, with multiple tails): Wow. Do NOT go over there.
